## Adding samples/boxes to -80°C freezer

- [ ] go to [-80°C Freezer Database](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A_5X403WKix3_2ExyA4KuSsd1mhb68AhzCNNQmD8gNo/edit?gid=326844608#gid=326844608) to see what shelfs are empty
- [ ] NOTE: fill rest of freezer before 1A shelves due to temp monitoring wires
- [ ] Once samples/boxes have been moved to freezer, update [-80°C Freezer Database](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A_5X403WKix3_2ExyA4KuSsd1mhb68AhzCNNQmD8gNo/edit?gid=326844608#gid=326844608)
  - [ ] add box name, owner, and link to the datasheet associated with the samples
- [ ] additionally add the box contents (samples within each box) on next tab
